item.title: What to do when you hate your job
item.description: Do you sometimes feel that you hate your job and have the feeling that you are the only one who suffers from this matter, while everyone around you seems to be occupying the job of their dreams, well this is a wrong feeling, only Gallup site about 85% of employees and workers around the world hate their jobs, for various reasons?
